title: WTT Hal Chase SGC 10 for common(s)
author: Cozumeleno

posts.post_title: WTT Hal Chase SGC 10 for common(s)
posts.post_content:
I have a Hal Chase Dark Cap Throwing SGC 10 up for trade in exchange for a common or two needed for my set. Would take any of the following deals:

1. Trade for a common below in SGC 20 or 30/PSA 1.5 or 2
2. Trade for a pair of raw commons (poor shape is fine) listed below ... this is my preference.
3. Trade straight up for a single SGC 10 below of Kleinow, Reulbach, or Schulte)

Johnny Bates
Beals Becker
Bill Carrigan
Lou Fiene (Portrait)
Bob Ganley
Rube Geyer
Del Howard
Red Kleinow (NY Catching)
Hans Lobert

Al Shaw

Gabby Street (Catching)
Jeff Sweeney 

I can post a scan if someone is legitimately interested. The card has many creases, but no trimming, writing, chunks of paper missing, etc.
